other_tests.procedure_name: Genomic DNA analysis for CASR mutations

other_tests.findings: No pathological changes; parathyroid adenoma excluded.
Heterozygous missense mutation c.44 G > T (p.R15L) found.

other_tests.procedure_name: Blood tests for plasma calcium, phosphate, and PTH
other_tests.date: Before treatment, during treatment and after treatment (varied dates)
other_tests.findings: Before treatment: Elevated calcium levels, normal PTH. During treatment: Calcium normalized, PTH levels decreased slightly. After treatment: Returned to high pretreatment levels.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Showed normalization during cinacalcet treatment and return to pre-treatment levels afterward.

other_tests.findings: Commenced to avoid negative skeletal effects of vitamin D deficiency; had no effect on serum calcium levels.
